tool_description: A quick, easy to use API to return torrent information and magnet URLs from the pirate bay database.
name: PirateBay Torrent Search
title: PirateBay Torrent Search

api_list.name: Top Torrents by Category / Time frame
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of torrents from The Pirate Bay database based on the specified category and time frame. Route parameters must each be set to an acceptable value, listed in the parameter details. If either parameter is not set to an acceptable value, the request will return a 400 error. The format of the endpoint URL is https://endpoint.com/top/{mode}/{category}.

required_parameters.name: mode
required_parameters.description: Specifier for the time frame to search for top torrents. Acceptable values are "alltime" and "48h". Any other values will return a 400 bad request.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Specifier for the category to search for top torrents. Acceptable values are "audio", "video", "applications", "games", "porn", "other", and "all". Any other values will return a 400 bad request.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://piratebay-torrent-search.p.rapidapi.com/top/alltime/audio"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piratebay-torrent-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://piratebay-torrent-search.p.rapidapi.com/top/{mode}/{category}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "piratebay-torrent-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
